short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a TL;DR summary of any article

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This TL;DR extension quickly creates a short summary of up to 120 words for any webpage you're viewing, using LLM technology to understand the page's content. Please read the privacy policy before using this extension.

Please note that these summaries might miss some important details, so they shouldn't be used to make important decisions. This tool is perfect for casual readers who want a quick preview to help them decide whether to read the full article.
